comment.body: I've been considering this specifically when trying to work out a secure handheld device, and I've moved away from using a phone entirely - I know it's a pain not to have the cellular network, but it was just such a huge threat vector.
@Musickiller: Yep.  Entirely on cash/crypto now, no phone at all.  Unplug!
@Musickiller: Yeah, I borrow other people's connections.
